wm-license-cc-by-sa-3.0-text: Lahabali kɔligu ŋɔ nyɛla [[{{int:wm-license-cc-wiki-link}}|Creative Commons]] [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/deed.en Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported] ni ti shɛli dihi tabili.
wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: Diyi lee ka a yan labi ŋma, n tari ka yan zaŋ tuma n talim
wm-license-cc-conditions: N-yɛn zaŋ dɔli zalikpana ŋɔ sɔli:
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: Di tu ni a ti nin'tiɣili din tu, ka yooi sɔli din yihiri shiɛhira gbaŋ, ka lahi wuhi di yi niŋ ka taɣibu daa pun niŋ. A ni tooi niŋ lala ŋɔ n-doli hankali ni saɣi shɛm, amaa ka di pa sɔ'shɛli din mali biɛhiŋ zaŋ kpa ŋun tiri shiɛhira gbana ŋɔ polo nin'tiɣili ni nyini bee a zaŋ tum.
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: A yi mali labi sabi bee a taɣi li mi bee a miɛmi n-tam sabiri kurili maa zuɣu, di tu ni a tari a tɔhibu maa doli [https://creativecommons.org/share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible-licenses same or compatible license] n-zali maŋ-maŋ maa.
